setSelection() is a bogus method on SynchronizeView because that view is 
asynchronously populated a client, setting the selection makes no sense. 
Refactored the callers.

I've also refactored the content provider quite a bit and haven't seen this 
NPE since I've been self-hosting on the post M2 changes to the synbc view. I'm 
pretty sure that this fixed it. 

I'll leave open and let Daniel close when you are happy that it is really 
fixed :)
Will be in tomorrow's integration build.
